features.title: Order History View
features.description: Display a comprehensive history of all executed orders with filtering and sorting capabilities
acceptance_criteria: Shows timestamp, order type, token, side, size, price for each order
Allows filtering by date range, order type, and token
Allows sorting by any column
Data persists in chrome.storage.local
Accessible from popup UI
features.implementation_notes: Implemented comprehensive order history system with storage service, UI component with filtering/sorting, tracking in order execution flow, and dedicated popup page accessible from main popup.

features.title: Export Order History to CSV
features.description: Allow users to export their order history to CSV format for analysis in spreadsheet tools
acceptance_criteria: Export button in order history view
CSV includes all order data fields
Respects current filters when exporting
Downloads with timestamp in filename
Handles special characters in data properly

features.title: Price Alert Notifications
features.description: Allow users to set price alerts for specific markets and receive Chrome notifications
acceptance_criteria: UI to create/edit/delete price alerts
Supports both 'above' and 'below' price thresholds
Service worker monitors prices and triggers alerts
Chrome notification shows market name, current price, and alert threshold
Alerts can be snoozed or dismissed
Alert history persists in storage
features.implementation_notes: Implemented comprehensive price alert system with storage service, background monitoring, Chrome notifications with snooze/dismiss functionality, dedicated UI page for alert management, and persistent alert history.

features.title: Portfolio Overview Dashboard
features.description: Display aggregate portfolio metrics including total value, P&L, and position breakdown
acceptance_criteria: Shows total portfolio value in USD
Shows realized P&L (from completed trades)
Shows unrealized P&L (from open positions)
Pie chart showing position distribution by market
Updates in real-time as prices change
Accessible from popup and content script overlay

features.title: Risk Management Settings
features.description: Allow users to configure risk parameters like max position size and daily loss limits
acceptance_criteria: Settings UI for max position size per market
Setting for max daily loss limit
Setting for max total portfolio exposure
Orders that would violate limits are rejected with clear error message
Settings persist in chrome.storage.local
Can temporarily override with confirmation dialog

features.title: Transaction Cost Analysis
features.description: Track and display transaction fees, gas costs, and slippage for each trade
acceptance_criteria: Captures gas cost for each transaction
Calculates slippage (expected vs actual price)
Shows total fees paid over time periods (day/week/month)
Includes fee data in order history export
Dashboard widget showing fee summary

features.title: Limit Order Support
features.description: Add support for limit orders that execute when market price reaches target
acceptance_criteria: UI to create limit orders with target price
Service worker monitors prices and executes when target reached
Shows pending limit orders in orders view
Can cancel pending limit orders
Integrates with existing order validation and retry logic
Persists across browser restarts

features.title: Multi-Market Watchlist
features.description: Allow users to create a watchlist of markets for quick monitoring
acceptance_criteria: Add/remove markets to watchlist
Shows current price and 24h change for each market
Updates prices in real-time
Quick action buttons to create orders
Reorderable via drag-and-drop
Persists in storage

features.title: Performance Analytics Charts
features.description: Visualize trading performance over time with interactive charts
acceptance_criteria: Line chart showing portfolio value over time
Bar chart showing daily P&L
Win rate and average win/loss metrics
Sharpe ratio calculation
Time period selector (1D/7D/30D/ALL)
Uses Chart.js or similar library

features.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
features.description: Add keyboard shortcuts for common actions to improve trading speed
acceptance_criteria: Configurable keyboard shortcuts in settings
Quick buy/sell for selected market
Quick cancel all orders
Toggle UI overlay visibility
Navigate between markets in watchlist
Shows shortcut hints in UI tooltips

notes: This PRD represents version 1.1.0 feature additions. Claude should work through these iteratively, starting with the highest priority features.
